content: the okrajno sodišče v ljubljani made a decision in a legal case involving the division of goods and funds the court determined that the deceased persons estate valued at 54000 eur includes funds in a personal bank account a savings account and unpaid pension benefits the deceased persons daughter and son will each receive half of the inheritance the court received a death certificate and determined that the deceaseds children are legitimate heirs the heirs accepted their shares of the inheritance and must arrange for the transfer of property and withdrawal of funds they also need to obtain a certificate from the probate inheritance department the court assessed fees of 612 eur which the heirs are responsible for paying the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal which must be submitted to the appropriate court with the necessary information and payment of the court fee

metadata.subject_of_succession: funds on personal bank account, funds on savings account, unpaid pension benefits
